Widgetize.PluginDescription: Display any Matomo report in your website or app with a simple Embed HTML tag.
Widgetize.ViewAccessRequired: This user has at least some write access. Only tokens of users who have only view access can be used. See %1$s for more information.
Widgetize.TopLinkTooltip: Export Matomo Reports as Widgets and embed the Dashboard in your app as an iframe.
Widgetize.TooHighAccessLevel: This user has super user access. For embedding widgets super user token auths are not allowed. %1$sSee our faq for more information.%2$s
